alert.note: Alert for Marshall (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 2:54PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Marshall County through 415 PM CDT... At 354 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over Britton, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, winds in excess of 40 mph, and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Marshall County. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
